name: Hellfire Gears
desc:
This W-Engine is renowned for its ultra power. Modified by Koleda, its energy level has almost exceeded the safety limit. Although this W-Engine is entirely designed for damage output, and the Speedup and Blaze functions have been merged into one, this is precisely what Koleda wanted.

<ct color=#959595>"I've got a clear shot at your shins, you know? So you'd better think twice before saying I'm short, got it?" â€” Koleda, warning a rude business partner</ct>
desc2: Equip to increase Stun Agents' combat capabilities
desc3: A functional W-Engine with ultra-high power capacity. Modified by Koleda, its energy level has almost exceeded the safety limit.
phaseDescs:
While off-field, the equipper's Energy Regen increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>0.6</ct>/s.
When using an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, the equipper's Impact is increased by <ct color=#2BAD00>10%</ct> for 10s, stacking up to 2 times. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

While off-field, the equipper's Energy Regen increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>0.75</ct>/s.
When using an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, the equipper's Impact is increased by <ct color=#2BAD00>12.5%</ct> for 10s, stacking up to 2 times. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

While off-field, the equipper's Energy Regen increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>0.9</ct>/s.
When using an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, the equipper's Impact is increased by <ct color=#2BAD00>15%</ct> for 10s, stacking up to 2 times. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

While off-field, the equipper's Energy Regen increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>1.05</ct>/s.
When using an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, the equipper's Impact is increased by <ct color=#2BAD00>17.5%</ct> for 10s, stacking up to 2 times. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.

While off-field, the equipper's Energy Regen increases by <ct color=#2BAD00>1.2</ct>/s.
When using an <ct color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</ct>, the equipper's Impact is increased by <ct color=#2BAD00>20%</ct> for 10s, stacking up to 2 times. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.
